alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:37PM EST until January 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...A wintry mix of freezing rain and drizzle will continue into this evening. Brief light snow and sleet also remains possible. Another round of light snow is possible late tonight. A glaze of ice and minor snow accumulation is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Indiana, western Kentucky, and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...From 10 AM Today to 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the Thursday evening commute and may also impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
